strings:
<voice_0x01000B1E><se_low>King Trode: I did it! I did it!
I finally did it!

<voice_0x01000B1F><se_low>King Trode: Ah, there you are, <hero>!
Perfect timing! I've got something to show you!

<voice_0x01000B20><se_low>King Trode: Ta-daaa! Looks like a normal pot, doesn't it?
But it's actually a legendary alchemy pot!

<voice_0x01000B21><se_low>King Trode: ...I can see that doesn't mean much to you.
Allow me to explain.
<voice_0x01000B22><se_low>King Trode: The alchemy pot is an invaluable tool for making different kinds of items!
<voice_0x01000B23><se_low>King Trode: It lets you mix different ingredients to create hard-to-find items, armour, and weapons.
<voice_0x01000B24><se_low>King Trode: After my kingdom was cursed, I thought it might come in handy and managed to spirit it out of the castle.

<voice_0x01000B25><se_low>King Trode: But that's not all. I spent night after night
trying to get it working again.
No, no. You can thank me later.

<voice_0x01000B26><se_low>King Trode: Right. Well, it's in my carriage,
so why don't you give it a try?
It's surprisingly easy to use.
The party can now use King Trode's alchemy pot!
<voice_0x01000B28><se_def>Captain: Belay the rigging and prepare to make port!

<voice_0x01000B2A><se_def>Quartermaster: Helmsman!
Bring us alongside Peregrin Quay!
